entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as a voice from somewhere around Harry's navel, indicating that Dobby is a small creature. He is described as having enormous, green, tennis-ball-shaped eyes and a pencil-shaped nose.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the person Dobby has been hoping to see. He is remembered by Dobby from his past experiences working for the Malfoys.

entities.name: malfoys
entities.description: The Malfoys are mentioned as the family Dobby used to work for. They are described as wizards who did a poor job of dressing Dobby.

entities.name: world cup
entities.description: The World Cup is mentioned as an event where wizards participated and did a poor job of dressing Dobby.

relationships.description: Dobby has been hoping to see Harry Potter, indicating that Dobby is eager to meet or interact with Harry.
Harry Potter has come to see Dobby, indicating that Harry is visiting or interacting with Dobby.
